item.title: Most crimes don't get solved, but for different reasons
item.description: Most property crimes arenâ€™t solved because no suspect is ever identified, while for violent crimes (except murder) a suspect is usually identified but there is not enough evidence to prosecute. larger image | PDF | annotated R code to produce this chart Data source: Home Office, 2018
